name: Burn The Halls
description:
You are Santa and the thermostat in your workshop just broke, threatening to freeze you to death. You must keep the bonfire going outside by collecting spare presents, furniture, etc. and throwing them into the flames. If you fail, you and your elves will surely die of hypothermia! 

Controls:
Forward - W
Left strafe - A
Backwards - S
Right strafe - D

Credits
